I also have this problem. The code base was developed under 3.0M4, and now with 
3.0M5 the Source->Generate Getter/Setter funtion does not work, with the 
exception logged as above.

Assigning to JDT/UI as it looks like createDialogArea is calling 
AbstractTreeViewer.reveal with a null argument.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 47378 ***
